source_objects.title: Social Media Marketing
source_objects.description: Become a Social Media Maven with courses that can increase your social media presence: create a social media strategy, underderstand Facebook, Twitter and more.

items.title: FACEBOOK ADS: The Step-by-Step Course 2020 for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to launch advertising campaigns on Facebook. No knowledge of Facebook Marketing required.
objectives_summary: Create and Manage the Business Manager
Be able to Freely use all the Functions of Ads Manager
Create Advertising Campaigns

items.title: Instagram Marketing: Become an Influencer Quickly!
items.headline: Learn to Create Viral Content, Optimize Your Profile & Unlock The Algorithm's Secrets to Get Massive Following
objectives_summary: How to market your business to hundreds of new customers everyday
You will learn simple strategies to gain targeted followers can significantly increase your businesses revenue
How to use tried-and-tested methods and techniques to gain followers with NO financial outlay

items.title: TikTok Marketing 2020  Grow Followers & Create Viral Content
items.headline: How to use TikTok,  gain a community of loyal followers, become TikTok famous and use it grow business sales
objectives_summary: Grow followers and dominate your niche on TikTok
Quickly learn how to use TikTok with a step-by-step app walkthrough without ever having to use the app before
Learn the latest features and functions on TikTok to accelerate your growth

items.title: Instagram Ads For Beginners: Hands On Training
items.headline: Create your first Instagram Ad. Master Instagram marketing and Ads to generate traffic and email business leads.
objectives_summary: Create your first Instagram Ad campaign
Learn different ways of creating Instagram Ads (Facebook Ads manager and Power editor)
Grow your business on Instagram and generate traffic and leads

items.title: Adobe Spark : The Complete Guide To Adobe Spark
items.headline: Create Animated Videos, Social Media Posts & Web Pages With Adobe Spark -Regardless of design/codin experience or budget
objectives_summary: 2020 Updates Included!
CREATE Professional Graphics To Deliver Your Business Message Effectively On Social Medial Channels Without Needing To Have Any Experience With Design using Adobe Spark
CREATE A Web Page To Showcase Your Business / Portfolio / Product / Service Without Needing To Learn Any Coding Language using Adobe Spark

items.title: Facebook Foundations: Learn Facebook Marketing for Business

objectives_summary: How to promote your webinar with paid Facebook ads
